author: .vbuterin
content: When you say "no execution", do you mean no verification of the whole chain, or no execution at all? I'm thinking about how `eth_call` would be handled

author: .vbuterin
content: The "ideal" way for a light client to do it would be to have an in-browser EVM implementation (those exist and are up to date, right?), and then every time it makes a storage request you would ask the server for the value with a proof

author: _jmc_.
content: I guess as long as the `beacon_state`  is correctly serialized its Merkle tree representation will always have the same structure so the generalized indices for those objects should be consistent across the various implementations (i.e.  I think it's ok to use Lodestar's precomputed values, at least for the prototype)
